name: D-Link DSP-W215
description: Control of connected D-Link DSP-W215 sockets in the Gladys home automation solution.
instructionsHTML:
To install this module :

  • Install this module in Gladys
  • Reboot Gladys
  • Socket setting :
    1. Create a Gladys param W215_PRISE with value IP_Address:PIN_Code (Pin code is indicated on the socket)
    2. Go to Module view on the dashboard, then click on the "Configuration" button. The socket is created.
    3. To install others sockets, repeat steps 1 and 2.
instructionsMarkDown:
To install this module :

- Install this module in Gladys
- Reboot Gladys
- Socket setting :
  1. Create a Gladys param W215_PRISE with value IP_Address:PIN_Code (Pin code is indicated on the socket)
  2. Go to Module view on the dashboard, then click on the "Configuration" button. The socket is created.
  3. To install others sockets, repeat steps 1 and 2.
